rocks.bastion.core.printer

Class HttpRequestPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocks.bastion.core.printer.HttpRequestPrinter

  • public class HttpRequestPrinter
extends Object
    Prints the given HttpRequest object in the same format that it is sent with using the HTTP protocol. This class is useful for logging and debugging purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpRequestPrinter(HttpRequest request)
      Constructs a new instance of this printer to format the specified request object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAsString()
      Formats and returns the request object.
      void print(Writer writer)
      Formats and prints the request object to the specified Writer stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequestPrinter

        public HttpRequestPrinter(HttpRequest request)
        Constructs a new instance of this printer to format the specified request object.
        Parameters:
        request - The request object to format. Cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public void print(Writer writer)
           throws IOException
        Formats and prints the request object to the specified Writer stream. The format used when outputting the response conforms to the HTTP standard.
        Parameters:
        writer - The writer to output to. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the request could not be formatted and sent to the specified writer.

      • getAsString

        public String getAsString()
        Formats and returns the request object. The format produced by this method for the request conforms to the HTTP standard.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the HTTP data received
